title: Travel Companion App
alt: Highlight photo from my Portugal trip
description: A travel journaling and location tracking app that blends curated highlights with shared photo albums. Designed to make documenting and reliving trips effortless and visually immersive.

title: SEPTA Transit Redesign
alt: Highlight photo from my London trip
description: A reimagined public transit experience focused on intuitive trip planning, live location integration, and streamlined schedule discovery. Built to solve usability frustrations in the current SEPTA app.

title: Ultra-Wideband Tracking System
alt: Highlight photo from my Japan trip
description: A precision indoor positioning system using UWB communication. Designed, implemented, and fully documented from hardware setup to signal processing and calibration algorithms.
